title: Is an Incurable “Mexican Blood Flu” Creating a Health Crisis at the Southern Border?
subtitle: Claims of a virulent outbreak at the U.S.-Mexico border mix inaccurate assertions from politicians with the claims of a supplement-peddling conspiracy publisher.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: A form of tuberculosis dubbed “Mexican blood flu” is being brought into the U.S. by immigrants crossing the Southern border.
